Reviews.Title: Pretty Good Thus Far
Reviews.Author: S.Lucian
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to replace my mom's old cell phone. She is not too technically savvy and literally just needs a phone to make and receive calls and also to check the time. This has definitely served its purpose. Taken a spill or two and is still going. Very durable and perfect for older individuals as the screen is vivid and the buttons are easily accessible.

Reviews.Title: Good, simple enough
Reviews.Author: MSM
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone as a gift for my mother because she hated her blackberry and couldn't work the buttons well.  This phone was easy enough for her to maneuver and store her contacts, take pictures and text. The slider feature is nice too.  She loves this phone and I'm happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: the phone is good and has a great feel to it its a little on the small side so would be better for a women but also can work for men

Reviews.Title: GREAT phone
Reviews.Author: Evan C
Reviews.Content: Had this phone for 2 years now. It has always worked. Although Internet is a bit Sluggish, Its not something you wouldn't expect.Phone is simple, for any Person. Gets  Job done well.

Reviews.Title: long battery life
Reviews.Author: Ian S "Rsayers"
Reviews.Content: simple, works a phone, has good volume and very long battery life. I broke the screen within 3 days of having it, but that's my fault, even if it's a little more delicate than expected.

Reviews.Title: CRAP!~
Reviews.Author: J. Martin Dempster
Reviews.Content: The phone was exactly as advertised, and arrived quickly. However, this technology is outdated and no longer works with the Sprint  system. I got what I asked for, unfortunately what I wanted no longer works. Did the seller know this? I would suppose and/or hope they did, except that they didn't tell me. So, no stars to this seller.

Reviews.Title: Bad !!! Non working phone!
Reviews.Author: ha m nguyen
Reviews.Content: Bad phone! Charger plug in was very loose did not want to take the charge! Never used it! Money down the drain.

Reviews.Title: Tough phone, good service from seller.
Reviews.Author: rufus
Reviews.Content: I had two of these phones for five years with no problems. Recently one of the phones stopped taking a charge.  After searching on line for a replacement, I decided that I couldn't do better than with what I had.  The used phone I purchased looks like new and works fine.  I plan on buying another if I have trouble with the other five-year-old phone.  The seller gave very good service.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Find
Reviews.Author: Herman Atwell
Reviews.Content: Very simple, easy, sharp phone that meets the essential expectations of a user with simple needs. That being my mom. A good find, to be sure.

Reviews.Title: GRT PHONE
Reviews.Author: RedBone47
Reviews.Content: PURCHASE THIS FOR MY YOUNG SON AND HE TRULY ENJOY IT AND IT WAS PERFECT FOR HIM TO USE AS HE NEEDED A PH IMMEDIATELY AND RCVD IT TIMELY AND WORKS GRT

Reviews.Title: awesome cell phone
Reviews.Author: vanessa
Reviews.Content: i would recommend this cell phone for any sprint users, this cell is small, convenient and durable. i like the seller because he is true to his words. the cell phone was so nice it got stolen lol this is the second cell phone i buy from them. no problems its all good.

ProductInfo.Features:
Stylish slider phone with brilliant 2-inch color display
Built-in speakerphone and voice dialing for hands-free communication
Threaded SMS text messaging with T9 predictive text input
Bluetooth enabled; built-in camera with 4x digital zoom
Up to 6.3 hours of talk time on a single charge
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung M330 Mobile Cell Phone (Sprint CDMA)
